intro.description: After a successful {strong}15-year career in logistics{/strong}, I pivoted to {strong}web development{/strong}, a field I am deeply passionate about. I find joy in {em}creating and innovating on the web{/em}. My recent focus has been on {u}JavaScript frameworks like React and Next.js{/u}, leveraging my skills to build responsive and impactful web applications.

about.title: About me
about.paragraph1: After {bold}15 years of experience in logistics{/bold}, I decided to pivot towards {bold}web development{/bold}, an area I've recently become certified in. This transition was driven by my proactive approach, leveraging my transferable skills and a strong desire for innovation. {italic}What excites me about programming{/italic} is the opportunity to solve complex problems and create impactful solutions. I {underline}love{/underline} the challenge and satisfaction that come from cracking a tough coding problem. My main technical skills include {bold}HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Express, Node.js, Git/Github, Leaflet, Swift, and SwiftUI{/bold}. I'm constantly seeking to expand my knowledge and apply it to real-world projects. I am actively looking for a {bold}new role{/bold} where I can contribute and grow as a web developer.
about.paragraph2: {italic}Outside of coding{/italic}, I'm passionate about {bold}diving, astronomy, and photography{/bold}. I also dedicate time to {bold}coaching Taekwondo{/bold}, reflecting my commitment to teaching and community involvement. I enjoy {bold}exploring new areas{/bold} and am always curious to learn more about {bold}technology and science{/bold}. Currently, I am enhancing my skills in web development technologies and methodologies.

kechwaffles.description: E-commerce website for authentic Belgian waffles. Features online ordering, product showcase, and streamlined checkout experience.

andco.description: Comprehensive SaaS platform for martial arts club management. Includes online event registration, automatic tournament brackets, member management, and automated communication tools.

pahn.description: Talent detection and development platform for French Taekwondo Federation. Features athlete evaluation, performance tracking, and talent management for preparing future champions.

bron.description: Managed the website and digital presence for the Taekwondo association, enhancing community engagement.

epsilon.description: Contributed to web projects, focusing on front-end technologies and MongoDB for database management.

instagrid.description: Developed iOS applications using Swift and SwiftUI during my training at OpenClassrooms.

datafight.description: A web app designed for analyzing Taekwondo fights and improving training methodologies. Responsive and user-friendly, it helps coaches and athletes track performance and strategize better.

ios.title: iOS Developer Training
ios.description: Completed iOS development training with Swift and SwiftUI, mastering Xcode and data management with CoreData.

intern.title: Web Developer Intern
intern.description: Internship focusing on front-end integration with HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, React, and Next.js; managed databases with MongoDB.

logistics.title: Logistics Technician & Technicien Referent
logistics.description: Managed logistics operations, specializing in goods reception, aseptic operations, sterilization, and continuous improvement.

trainer.title: Taekwondo Trainer
trainer.description: Management of athletes, organization of events and competitions, and development of training programs.

footer.tech: built with React & Next.js (App Router & Server Actions), TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Framer Motion, React Email & Resend, Vercel hosting.
